transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ujjwal ji pankaj baat kar raha hoon abhi baat hui thi na apni wo by leads ko lekar aur wo jo aapko mail jaati hai usme maine apni team se check karwaya wo jo mails aa rahi hai na aapko wo to services hi aap wo de rahe ho customer ki matlab customer mang raha hai youtube monetization karwana koi affiliate marketing jana chah raha hai koi telegram add services aap run karwana chah raha hai matlab aap to deal hi in sab me karte ho to sahi to aa raha hai sir wo
Customer: India mart to isliye likha hua hai
Executive: India mart to isliye likha hua aa raha hai kyuki aap by lead purchase kar rahe ho na India mart se wo
Customer: hmm
Executive: aapne click kiya hoga na contact buyer now contact buyer now pe only leads pe isliye queries pe
Customer: wo wo main bata raha hoon koi lead sahi ka nahi hai na
Executive: koi lead kya nahi hai
Customer: sahi nahi hai ek bhi not theek thaak koi aaya
Executive: ha to isliye hum 17 by lead dete hain ki aapko har customer se ek baar baat karni hai customer to bolega ki nahi
Customer: sir main kya bolna lead sahi nahi hai phone hi nahi pick up karte hain sab
Executive: sir dekhiye hamara India mart ka kaam kya hai aapki company ko promote karna hai na ab usme genuine customer bhi milega not genuine ab to aapki shop me aate honge log kuch ki ye bataye wo bataye chale jate honge puch ke aise India online bhi aise hi chalta hai sir ye ab inhi logo me se conversion bhi aapko milega business bhi yhi log karwa ke denge lekin ha ye chalta hum customer ko rok to nahi sakte na hame to nahi pata ye purchase karne wala hai ya nahi purchase karne wala hai
Customer: ha ha
Executive: to ye marketing marketing aapka karna hamara India mart ka kaam hai hai na customer ke samne aapki company ko dikhana to wo hum dikha rahe hain usme customer kuch requirement dal raha hai wo aapko show karwate hain usi me se customer lega bhi usi me se customer mana bhi karega
Customer: ha
Executive: theek hai ab clear ho gaya na sir ye kyu mails aa rahi hai wo mail India mart ke name se hi aayega aapko
Customer: theek hai sir but usme lead sahi nahi hai na bas
Executive: wo to sir abhi aapne dekhiye start hi hua hai sir aapka ha isliye to main wait kar raha hoon abhi start hua hai jaise hi aapka convert hona shuru ho gaya aap kahenge theek hai ki usme se itna convert business ho gaya itna abhi to jaise aapka start hua hai kal se hi
Customer: to bhi ha ha isliye to main nahi ghabra raha hoon
Executive: ha to aap usme koi mat kariye wo abhi main ye concern aap close kar raha hoon theek hai aapka ye pehle maine kiya nahi tha maine dala hua tha management ko to theek hai ab mail aayega to aap please us pe satisfied mark kar lijiyega aur aap ek whatsapp pe wo photo bhej rahe the na two days old lead wo whatsapp wagera pe nahi karna upload wo vinit ko karna hai aapko bhejna hai sir
Customer: theek hai theek hai
Executive: customer care wale whatsapp pe bhej rahe the wo bhi aap 9696 pe
Customer: theek hai
Executive: theek hai wo apne account manager ko aap bhejiye ga vinit hai aapke account manager unko bhejiye ga aap
Customer: theek hai theek hai
Executive: okay Ujjwal ji thank you sir thank you so much for your time sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer complains about receiving incorrect buyleads.

- Customer mentions not receiving calls on leads.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the purpose of IndiaMART.

- Executive explained the lead generation process.

- Executive assured the customer about the process.

- Executive closed the concern.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to mark satisfied on receiving mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, customer service, account manager
